home.title: Sweet Bonihu | Luxury Wellness B&B in Bruges
home.description: Discover ultimate relaxation in our luxury wellness suites with private jacuzzi and sauna in the heart of Bruges. Book your romantic escape now.

loft.title: The Loft | Luxury Wellness Suite with Jacuzzi | Sweet Bonihu
loft.description: Enjoy our exclusive Loft suite with private jacuzzi, infrared sauna and king-size bed. The perfect romantic escape in Bruges.

midsomer.title: Midsomer | Cozy Room | Sweet Bonihu
midsomer.description: Stay in our cozy Midsomer room with authentic charm and modern comfort. Pets welcome in Bruges.

romantic.title: Romantic Package | Exclusive Arrangement | Sweet Bonihu
romantic.description: Surprise your partner with our romantic package: champagne, flowers, chocolate and unlimited wellness. Book your dream stay now.

contact.title: Contact | Sweet Bonihu Bruges
contact.description: Contact Sweet Bonihu for reservations or questions. We are happy to help you plan your perfect stay in Bruges.

blog.title: Blog | Sweet Bonihu
blog.description: Discover tips about Bruges, wellness and news from Sweet Bonihu. Inspiration for your perfect stay.

hero.subtitle: Wellness & Lodging in Bruges
hero.title: Sweet Bonihu
hero.description: Discover ultimate relaxation in our luxury wellness suites, located in the romantic heart of Bruges. A place where tranquility and refinement come together.

about.subtitle: Welcome
about.title: An Oasis of Tranquility
about.description: Sweet Bonihu offers a unique combination of Flemish hospitality and contemporary comfort. Our wellness suites are carefully designed to provide you with an unforgettable experience.
about.descriptionSecond: Located within walking distance of the historic center of Bruges, our boutique B&B is the perfect base for both romantic weekends and relaxation trips.

wellness.title: Private Wellness
wellness.description: Enjoy your own jacuzzi and sauna, whenever you want.

location.title: Perfect Location
location.description: Walking distance from all the sights of Bruges.

breakfast.title: Extensive Breakfast
breakfast.description: Start your day with a rich and freshly prepared breakfast.

loft.name: The Loft
loft.subtitle: Luxury Wellness Suite
loft.description: Our gem on the second floor with private jacuzzi, infrared sauna and a breathtaking view. Perfect for a romantic escape.
loft.contentDescription: "The Loft" is our gem, located on the second floor in romantic Bruges. This exceptional suite is equipped with a private jacuzzi and infrared sauna that you can enjoy unlimited.
loft.contentDescriptionSecond: Perfect for a romantic weekend, a honeymoon or simply to escape the daily hustle. Immerse yourself in luxury and relax in an atmospheric environment.

midsomer.name: Midsomer
midsomer.subtitle: Cozy Room
midsomer.description: A cozy room with authentic charm and modern comfort. Ideal for guests seeking peace and coziness.
midsomer.contentDescription: "Midsomer" is our cozy room where authentic Bruges charm and modern comfort come together. The warm atmosphere and carefully chosen details make your stay extra special.
midsomer.contentDescriptionSecond: This room is perfect for guests looking for a peaceful, homely atmosphere combined with all modern conveniences. Pets are very welcome here.
midsomer.petsDescription: At Midsomer, your four-legged friends are very welcome. We ensure a comfortable stay for the whole family.

romantic.contentDescription: Surprise your partner with an unforgettable experience. Our romantic package combines luxury, wellness and the enchanting atmosphere of Bruges into one unforgettable experience.
includes: Overnight stay in The Loft suite
romantic.priceDescription: Prices vary depending on the chosen dates and availability. Contact us for a personalized quote.

items.text: A fantastic experience! The jacuzzi was wonderful and the breakfast delicious. We will definitely be back.
items.author: Sophie & Thomas

items.text: Perfect location, beautiful room and very friendly hosts. The romantic package was worth every penny.
items.author: Marie & Pierre

items.text: The Loft is truly a gem. Everything was taken care of down to the smallest detail. Absolutely recommended!
items.author: Jan & Lisa
